title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.58 - Decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.58 - Decision

State Regulations

The Board will issue a resolution of decision adopted by
a majority vote of the Board within a reasonable time after the conclusion of
any hearing held pursuant to this Part, and serve it on the parties, or if
represented by a designated representative or attorney, on such representative
or attorney. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.58

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
